Rulings.Base: 1. If the Tuner monster used to Synchro Summon with "Monoceros" is not a Beast-Type monster on the field and in the GY, the effect to Special Summon it cannot be activated.\n2. You can target a Beast-Type Tuner you used that was sent to the opponent's GY and you will still Special Summon it.\n3. You cannot Special Summon "Monoceros" with "Rescue Cat".

PSCT.Base: This card cannot be Normal Summoned or Set. This card can only be Special Summoned by removing from play 1 Spell Card from your hand. When you Synchro Summon using this card and a Beast-Type Tuner monster as the Synchro Material Monsters, you can select 1 Beast-Type Tuner monster used for the Synchro Summon and Special Summon it from the Graveyard.
